participant_1.background:
I have moved a lot in my life, but I have found it to be a great way to learn about new places and cultures.
my favorite food is a cheeseburger.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i drink a lot of caffeine.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

participant_2.background:
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
i prefer the night instead of the day.
kpop is my favorite music.
i live on a pig farm.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I'm new to the area, and I'm looking for some friends.
Hi! I'm participant_2. I'm also new to the area. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, I'm an only child, and I love cheeseburgers. Do you have any hobbies?
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make pottery.
It's a lot of fun! I've been doing it for a few years now, and I'm still learning new things all the time.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at it.
Thanks! I'm pretty happy with how it's coming along.
What kind of things do you like to photograph?
I like to photograph nature, people, and my everyday life.
That sounds really cool! I love photography, but I'm not very good at it.
You just have to keep practicing! Everyone has to start somewhere.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm definitely going to try to get better at it.
I'm sure you will!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, volunteer at an urban farm, and I live on a pig farm.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a concert, but I've always wanted to go.
They're a lot of fun! You should definitely go to one sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem!
So, what's your favorite music?
My favorite music is K-pop.
I've never heard of K-pop. What is it?
It's Korean pop music. It's really popular in Korea, and it's starting to become more popular here in the US.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! I think you'd like it.
